title: Cold plasma technology for sustainable food production: Meeting the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.

This review explores the multifaceted contributions of cold plasma technologies to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Throughout this examination, we will establish linkages between various aspects of cold...
